question: Which college inaugurated the human milk bank to provide breast milk to newborns who cannot be nursed by their own mothers?
option2: All India Institute of Medical Sciences
explanation: A national human milk bank was inaugurated at Lady Hardinge Medical College (LHMC) in New Delhi to provide breast milk to newborns who cannot be nursed by their own mothers. The human milk bank and lactation counselling centre, 'Vatsalya - Maatri Amrit Kosh', will collect, pasteurise, test and store milk donated by lactating mothers and make it available for infants in need.
